H0.text: Who according to legend was the son of Zeus and Europa and became King of Crete. Atlas

H1.text: Who according to legend was the son of Zeus and Europa and became King of Crete. Asterion

H2.text: Who according to legend was the son of Zeus and Europa and became King of Crete. Rhadamanthus

H3.text: Who according to legend was the son of Zeus and Europa and became King of Crete. Μίνω

A4.text: In Greek mythology, Minos (/ˈmaɪnɒs, -nəs/ ; Greek: Μίνως, [mǐːnɔːs]) was a king of Crete, son of Zeus and Europa.

A5.text: Asterion, king of Crete, adopted the three sons of Zeus and Europa: Minos, Sarpedon, and Rhadamanthus.
